author: Katie Baillie
description: Soundgarden played in Detroit on May 18.
title: Chris Cornell's last performance with Soundgarden hours before sudden death

author: Sasha Geffen
description: He died Wednesday in Detroit after a Soundgarden concert
title: Chris Cornell, Lead Singer Of Soundgarden And Audioslave, Dead At 52

author: Jake Kanter
description: A representative for the Audioslave and Soundgarden frontman told AP that his death was "sudden and unexpected."
title: Audioslave and Soundgarden frontman Chris Cornell has died at the age of 52

description: Cornell, who gained fame as the lead singer of the bands Soundgarden and later Audioslave, died Wednesday.
title: Chris Cornell, Singer of Soundgarden and Audioslave, Dies at 52

author: BBC News
description: A medical examiner confirms the 52-year-old Soundgarden star died shortly after a concert in Detroit.
title: Chris Cornell: Soundgarden star dies of 'hanging by suicide'

author: Jayme Deerwester
description: Rocker Chris Cornell, who gained fame as the lead singer of the bands Soundgarden and later Audioslave, died Wednesday night in Detroit.
title: Soundgarden singer Chris Cornell's death ruled a suicide

author: Alexander Smith
description: Soundgarden frontman Chris Cornell died suddenly late Wednesday, his spokesman told NBC News. He was 52.
title: Chris Cornell, Soundgarden frontman and grunge icon, dead at 52

author:
Sam Hockley-Smith

description: The Soundgarden and Audioslave front man was a defining figure of the grunge scene and one of the best rock vocalists we had.
title: 10 Amazing Vocal Performances From Soundgarden’s Chris Cornell

description: Chris Cornell, former frontman of Soundgarden and Audioslave, passed away May 17, 2017 in Detroit at the age of 52. In light of his passing, we are republishing this early feature with Soundgarden, which originally appeared in the December 1989 issue of Spin.  They're Axl's favorite band, one of the 150 or so that Ian Astbury loves and hopes to produce, and the folks Mark Lanegan of the Screaming Trees calls "four guys who wear clothes." Soundgarden are all meat and hair and ripped knees, the band most likely to succeed from the Seattle scene. Spread out on the long beige-plaid couch on the long porch of a huge, old, white house, they are drinking Budweiser and talking about what to do this evening. "So, are we gonna play tonight or not?" guitarist Kim Thayil asks. SubPop Records, which released Soundgarden's first EP Screaming Life in '87 and is the home to the grunge bands that define the Seattle scene (Mudhoney, Tad, Nirvana and the Fluid–heavy metal as played by people who
title: SPIN's 1989 Soundgarden Profile | SPIN

author: Spiegel Online
description: Er war neben Kurt Cobain eine der prominentesten Figuren des Grunge: Chris Cornell, Sänger der amerikanischen Band Soundgarden, ist gestorben. Er wurde 52 Jahre alt.
title: Sänger von Soundgarden: Chris Cornell ist tot
